===============
Release History
===============

`0.0.2`_ (10 Feb 2018)
----------------------
- Implemented correlation header relaying via
  :class:`divak.api.RequestIdPropagator`.

`0.0.1`_ (4 Feb 2018)
---------------------
- Worked out the Circle-CI build process.
- No content changes.

`0.0.0`_ (4 Feb 2018)
---------------------
- Initial tag to verify end-to-end pipeline.
